alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:32AM EST until February 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina and South Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Black Creek At Quinby affecting Florence and Darlington Counties. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Pembroke, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Black Creek...including Quinby, Black Creek Nr Hartsville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River Near Lumberton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Sunday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Lumber River Lumberton 13.0 12.3 Sun 7 am EST 13.6 13.1 12.9 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
